|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723BE; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "HM23B00-0V6" is silkscreened on the back of this card in the FCC photos.
The FCC test report specifies multiple card types... *'''HMC''' (Mini PCIe Half miniCard) :PCIe for WLAN and USB for Bluetooth :U.FL antenna connector *'''NGFF''' M.2 (2230) :PCIe for WLAN and USB for Bluetooth :MHF4 antenna connector *'''NGFF''' :SDIO for WLAN and UART for Bluetooth :MHF4 antenna connector
==See also== *[[Realtek RTL8723BE Combo Module]] :''802.11bgn + BT RTL8723BE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8723BE TX2-RTL8723BE] (2013-05-08) *[[Realtek RTL8723BS Combo Module (SDIO)]] :''802.11bgn RTL8723BS Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8723BS TX2-RTL8723BS] (2014-05-14) *[[Dell Wireless 1801 (DW1801)]] (10ec:b723/10ec:8739) :PCI\VEN_10EC&DEV_B723&SUBSYS_873910EC :Dell Wireless 1801 Card - Dell Wireless DW1801 (0KJTH7) :WLAN WiFi 802.11b/g/n + Bluetooth 4.0 M.2 Card (laptops)
